special_abilities.name: Keen Smell.
descriptions: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Pounce.
descriptions: If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.
